title: Golden Shower
summaries: The Golden Shower is a Hardmode magic weapon that fires an arching piercing golden stream, similar to the Aqua Scepter. The Golden Shower fires three times per use, each stream can pierce up to four enemies, and the player can change the direction of aim between these sprays. Enemies hit will be inflicted with the Ichor debuff, which lowers their defense by 15 / 20 and causes them to glow gold, even in complete darkness. However, this cannot be used to explore the map, as the enemy coated in ichor does not actually emit light.

Crafting the Golden Shower requires ingredients found only in worlds containing Crimson. In worlds originally generated with Corruption, Crimson Seeds can be purchased from the Dryad while in a Graveyard in a Hardmode world in order to create the Underground Crimson biome in which Ichor can be obtained. On [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it has a 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance to be dropped by the Jungle Mimic in a world with the seed celebrationmk10.
Its best modifier is Mythical. However, an alternative modifier is Manic, for those who just want to benefit from the Ichor debuff this weapon applies.
